Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Consulates[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Gain 1 additional Delegate in the World Congress, and 1 additional Delegate for each Era you advance past the Renaissance.
Consulate
Grants you 1 additional Delegate in the World Congress.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This building appears for free when you choose the Consulates Social Policy in the Patronage tree.
Consulate Wing 1

Grants you 1 additional Delegate in the World Congress.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This building appears for free when you choose the Consulates Social Policy in the Patronage tree and you have advanced to the Industrial Era.
Consulate Wing 2

Grants you 1 additional Delegate in the World Congress.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This building appears for free when you choose the Consulates Social Policy in the Patronage tree and you have advanced to the Modern Era.
Consulate Wing 3

Grants you 1 additional Delegate in the World Congress.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This building appears for free when you choose the Consulates Social Policy in the Patronage tree and you have advanced to the Atomic Era.
Consulate Wing 4

Grants you 1 additional Delegate in the World Congress.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This building appears for free when you choose the Consulates Social Policy in the Patronage tree and you have advanced to the Information Era.
